content.question: Students draw the schematic diagram shown above for a circuit they constructed using six identical resistors of resistance <math alttext="R" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, a battery of emf <math alttext="epsilon" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>Îµ</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> , and an ammeter. A second group of students constructs another circuit using identical materials, but their schematic diagram looks different. Which of the following diagrams would dissipate energy at the same rate as the one shown above?

choices.label: The figure presents a rectangular circuit. Beginning on the left side and moving clockwise, the left side has a battery underneath an ammeter. The top left side has a resistor and the top right side has a group of two resistors in parallel. The bottom side has a group of three resistors, with two on top placed in parallel with one on the bottom.

The figure presents a rectangular circuit. Beginning on the left side and moving clockwise, the left side has a battery underneath an ammeter. The top side has a group of resistors. There are three parallel branches where the top and bottom branches each have on resistor and the middle branch has two. The bottom side has a group of two resistors in parallel.

The figure presents rectangular circuit with middle horizontal branch. Beginning on the top side and moving clockwise, the top left side has a resistor and the top right side has a group of two resistors in parallel. The bottom side has an ammeter to the right of a battery. The middle horizontal branch has a group of resistors, with two on the top placed in parallel with one on the bottom.

The figure presents a rectangular circuit with middle horizontal branch. Beginning on the top side and moving clockwise, the top left side has a resistor and the top right side has a group of two resistors in parallel. The right side above the middle horizontal branch has an ammeter. The bottom side has a battery. The middle horizontal branch has a group of resistors, with one on the bottom placed in parallel with two on the top.

The figure presents a rectangular circuit. Beginning on the left side and moving clockwise, the left side has a battery. The top side has a group of resistors. There are three parallel branches where the top and bottom branches each have one resistor and the middle branch has two. The right side has an ammeter. The bottom side has a group of two resistors in parallel.

content.answer: The figure presents a rectangular circuit. Beginning on the left side and moving clockwise, the left side has a battery underneath an ammeter. The top left side has a resistor and the top right side has a group of two resistors in parallel. The bottom side has a group of three resistors, with two on top placed in parallel with one on the bottom.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
